## Summary

* What problem does it solve?

## Type of Change

Mark the relevant option(s):

* [ ] Bug fix
* [ ] New feature
* [ ] Accuracy improvement (text / image)
* [ ] New verification modality (audio / video)
* [ ] Hybrid verification (multi-modal)
* [ ] Refactor / cleanup
* [ ] Documentation update

Please confirm:

* [ ] Code follows existing style and patterns
